Job Title
Sr. Engineer, Kubernetes Platform-2
Overview
Distributed Platforms represents the next phase in the advancement of our digital transformation and is a significant evolution for MasterCard. We continue to grow our Platform as a Service organization to support aggressive growth plans. MasterCard is seeking a Sr. Software Engineer to be part of implementation of Kubernetes Service as well as other core services need to operationalize Kubernetes. This position requires a working knowledge of what it takes to stand up on-prem/off Platforms like Kubernetes and understands how elastic runtimes support distributed compute and storage needs.
Responsibilities
The Cloud Platforms team is responsible for the day to day maintenance and operation of various cloud platforms and their supporting services.
Cloud Platform Engineers are engaged in the project lifecycle as infrastructure is designed and ultimately inherit responsibility of the new environment.
The primary responsibility of the team is to react to incidents in cloud, PaaS, Kubernetes and pipeline infrastructure platforms.
Secondary objectives of the team are to improve the resiliency of systems through active contribution back to design as well as automating repetitive tasks.
Requires a moderate understanding of various platforms used for delivery of traditional and cloud services.
Requires the ability to write automation code to remediate repeat issues.
Requires a working understanding of Continuous Delivery principals, software development methodologies and infrastructure automation.
This is a “hands on” role that deals with reacting to and proactively avoiding issues with infrastructure platforms used for delivery of cloud services.
Do you enjoy creating code-based solutions to replace manual processes?
Are you the type of person that will drive the solution and team in the best direction instead of the easiest?
Experiences
Expert understanding of Operational duties
Working knowledge of target platforms (Kubernetes, Helm, Kustomize, KubeCTL, RKE, KubeADM)
Familiarity with Gateways, API technology and basic knowledge of traffic flows inside a Kubernetes Platform.
Good understanding of container life cycle management
Highly attuned to security needs and best practices
Ability to write quality automation code in more than one language
Familiarity with running AI/ML workloads in Kubernetes platform is a Big Plus
Any Kubernetes Certification is a BIG Plus.
Prior experience with Cloud Native Architecture and development
Excellent communication / presentation skills
Due to COVID-19, most of our employees are working from home. We’ve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely. We value the safety of each member of our community because we know we’re all in this together.
